job.title: Software Engineer, Backend

job.description: USA Maumee OH USA Plano TX USA San Francisco CAbrbrstrong Its an exciting time to come aboard Dynata Were growing and shifting gears as we leverage our maturity and profitability to energetic team utilizing the latest in cutting edge technology to make a measurable and visible impact on our organization brbrstrongstrong The BackEnd Software Engineer is a solid positive and innovative individual who thrives in a group with a smallteam but bigideas mentality You will get an opportunity to build exciting new products and allow you to thrive in a culture that supports you and promotes your career growth brstrongulli We will not be able to sponsor workrelated Visas brliulstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliCompile and analyze data processes and code bases to simple solutions liliProficient in Web app architecture HTTP Web Services and e xperience building and testing REST APIs liliKnowledge of multiple serverside languages either compiled or interpreted Can understand benefits and downsides of using a specific language We use Rust Python and CliliGreat understanding of version control and branching workflows We use gitliliUnderstanding of how to build and maintain CICD pipelines such as built on TeamCity Jenkins etclili Knowledge of Data Streams technologies is a plus such as Kafka AWS Kinesis lili Can utilize container technologies like Docker and understands what they do and dont solve brliulstronguEducation And Experiencebrustrongulli 5 years of professional software engineering experience lili Bachelors degree in computer science or related discipline or significant professional experience lili Ample experience using AWS specifically RDS ECS CloudWatch brliulDynata is one of the worlds leading single providers of firstparty
